hero_subtitle: Located at C. Pintor Peñalosa, Córdoba. Book your locker in minutes.
pricing_plan1_title:
Size M
28 cm x 41 cm x 56 cm
pricing_plan1_description: Fits one small suitcase or backpack.
pricing_plan2_title:
Size L
50 cm x 41 cm x 56 cm
pricing_plan2_description: Fits two small suitcases, two backpacks or one large suitcase.
pricing_plan3_title:

faq_q1: How does the locker service work?
faq_a1: Our smart locker service allows you to safely store your luggage. You just need to book online, arrive at the location, use your code and store your belongings.
